title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When a working set is removed, any changes made to the package view immediately take effect.
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. 2. The package view should be filtered accordingly.
EB: When I remove the working set, the changes made to the package view should not take effect until I refresh or perform another operation.
SR: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. 2. Verify that the package view is filtered accordingly. 3. Remove the working set. 4. Observe that the package view is not immediately updated. 5. Refresh the package view or perform another operation. 6. Observe that the package view is now updated according to the removed working set.
